name: Summoning Soup
description:
This game was made in 72 hours as part Ludum dare 45
It's a short adventure about a small cultist alone in the wold after his village was crushed by a demon hungry for soup you must collect 3 magical ingredients to appease him, however each is guarded by villainous bosses.

Credits: George Brown-Game design and development, animation, partial 3D modeling, audio recording.
Constance Graham- main 3D modeling, texturing, character deign, audio recording.

Music by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
